mapper.sql: flash_promotion_pdt_id, flash_promotion_id, flash_promotion_sn_id, product_id, flash_promotion_price, flash_promotion_count, flash_promotion_limit, sort, create_time, update_time,flash_promotion_round, user_id,publisher_id,sku_stock_id,is_publish_status,flash_product_status,order_id,flash_promotion_origin_price,partner_price
mapper.select: SELECT sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_sn_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_price, sfpp.flash_promotion_count, sfpp.flash_promotion_limit, sfpp.sort, sfpp.create_time, sfpp.update_time, pp.product_id pp_product_id, pp.product_name pp_product_name, sfp.flash_promotion_id sfp_flash_promotion_id, sfp.flash_promotion_title sfp_flash_promotion_title FROM sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp left join pms_product pp ON sfpp.product_id = pp.product_id left join sms_flash_promotion sfp ON sfpp.flash_promotion_id = sfp.flash_promotion_id where flash_promotion_pdt_id = #{flashPromotionPdtId}

select pp.product_id, pp.product_name, pp.pic, sfp.flash_promotion_id, sfp.flash_promotion_title, sfp.start_time, sfp.end_time, sfp.is_home_status as home_status, sfp.cpy_type, sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_price, sfpp.flash_promotion_count, sfpp.user_id, sfpp.is_publish_status as publish_status, sfpp.flash_product_status, sfpp.flash_promotion_origin_price, sfpp.create_time, sfpp.flash_promotion_limit, sfpp.partner_price, sfpp.expire_time FROM sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp LEFT JOIN pms_product pp on pp.product_id = sfpp.product_id LEFT JOIN sms_flash_promotion sfp on sfp.flash_promotion_id = sfpp.flash_promotion_id order by sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id desc

SELECT sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_sn_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_price, SUM(sfpp.flash_promotion_count) flash_promotion_count, sfpp.flash_promotion_limit, sfpp.flash_promotion_id, sfpp.sort, sfpp.create_time, sfpp.update_time, pp.product_id pp_product_id, pp.product_name pp_product_name, pp.pic pp_pic FROM sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp left join pms_product pp ON sfpp.product_id = pp.product_id where sfpp.flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionPdtId} and user_id > 0 GROUP BY sfpp.`product_id`,sfpp.`flash_promotion_price`,sfpp.`cpy_type` order by sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id desc limit 6;

SELECT sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_sn_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_price, sfpp.flash_promotion_count, sfpp.flash_promotion_limit, sfpp.sort, sfpp.create_time, sfpp.update_time, pp.product_id pp_product_id, pp.product_name pp_product_name FROM sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp left join pms_product pp ON sfpp.product_id = pp.product_id where sfpp.flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionId}

select flash_promotion_pdt_id,sub_title,price,flash_promotion_count,sp_data,flash_promotion_round,merchant_order,system_order,start_time from ( select a.flash_promotion_pdt_id,b.sub_title,c.price,a.flash_promotion_count,c.sp_data,a.flash_promotion_round,0.0 merchant_order,0.0 system_order,e.start_time from sms_flash_promotion_product a inner join pms_product b on b.product_id=a.product_id inner join pms_sku_stock c on c.sku_stock_id=a.sku_stock_id inner join pms_brand d on d.brand_id=b.brand_id inner join sms_flash_promotion e on e.flash_promotion_id=a.flash_promotion_sn_id and #{nowDate} between end_time and start_time union select 0 flash_promotion_pdt_id,'' sub_title,0 price,0 flash_promotion_count,'' sp_data,0 flash_promotion_round,a.merchant_order,a.system_order,'' start_time from sys_tem_setting a where a.tem_setting_id='1') a where a.flash_promotion_pdt_id <> 0 and flash_promotion_pdt_id=#{integralId}

select sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_sn_id, sfpp.product_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_price, sfpp.flash_promotion_count, sfpp.sort, sfpp.create_time, sfpp.update_time, sfpp.flash_promotion_round, sfpp.user_id, sfpp.publisher_id, sfpp.sku_stock_id, sfpp.is_publish_status, CASE WHEN DATE( sfpp.expire_time ) < DATE( CURRENT_DATE ()) THEN '-1' ELSE sfpp.flash_product_status END AS flash_product_status, sfpp.flash_promotion_limit, sfpp.order_id, sfpp.pdt_store_obj, sfpp.expire_time, pp.product_id, pp.brand_id, pp.pdt_cgy_id, pp.pdt_attribute_cgy_id, pp.product_name, pp.pic, pp.sale, pp.description, pp.sub_title, pp.album_pics, sfp.start_time sfp_start_time, sfp.end_time sfp_end_time, pp.detail_desc, pp.purchase_note, pp.partner_id from pms_product pp left join sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp on pp.product_id = sfpp.product_id left join sms_flash_promotion sfp on sfp.flash_promotion_id = sfpp.flash_promotion_id where sfpp.is_publish_status = 1 and deleted=0 and sfpp.product_id = #{qo.productId} and sfpp.flash_promotion_id = #{qo.flashPromotionId} and sfpp.flash_promotion_price = #{qo.flashPromotionPrice} limit 1;

select sfpp.product_id, pp.pdt_cgy_id, pp.product_name, pss.pic, pss.sku_stock_id, pss.sp_data, sfpp.flash_promotion_price * #{qo.quantity} price from pms_product pp left join sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp on pp.product_id = sfpp.product_id left join pms_sku_stock pss on pp.product_id = pss.product_id where sfpp.product_id = #{qo.productId} and pss.sku_stock_id = #{qo.skuStockId} and sfpp.is_publish_status = 1 and sfpp.flash_promotion_id = #{qo.flashPromotionId} and sfpp.flash_promotion_price = #{qo.flashPromotionPrice} limit 1;

SELECT sfpp.`flash_promotion_pdt_id`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_count`, sfpp.`partner_price`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_price`, sfpp.`expire_time` FROM `sms_flash_promotion_product` AS sfpp WHERE sfpp.`product_id` = #{productId} AND sfpp.`flash_promotion_count` > 0 AND sfpp.`flash_promotion_price` = #{price} AND sfpp.`flash_promotion_id` = #{flashPromotionId} GROUP BY sfpp.`flash_promotion_pdt_id` ORDER BY sfpp.`flash_promotion_pdt_id` ASC

SELECT sfpp.`flash_promotion_pdt_id`, sfpp.`product_id`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_origin_count`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_count`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_price`, sfpp.`publisher_id`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_origin_price`, sfpp.`cpy_type` FROM `sms_flash_promotion_product` AS sfpp WHERE sfpp.`flash_promotion_id` = #{flashPromotionId} AND sfpp.`is_publish_status` = 1

SELECT sfpp.`flash_promotion_pdt_id`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_id`, sfpp.`product_id`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_origin_count`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_count`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_price`, sfpp.`publisher_id`, sfpp.`flash_promotion_origin_price`, sfpp.`cpy_type`, sfpp.`flash_product_status` FROM `sms_flash_promotion_product` AS sfpp WHERE sfpp.`flash_promotion_pdt_id` = #{flashPromotionPdtId} AND sfpp.`is_publish_status` = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE sms_flash_promotion_product SET flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionId} WHERE flash_promotion_id = #{replacedFlashPromotionId} AND is_publish_status = 1
mapper.select: select flash_promotion_id,flash_promotion_title,cpy_type from sms_flash_promotion WHERE `start_time` >= NOW() AND `is_publish_status` = 1 AND is_home_status = 1 ORDER BY `start_time` ASC LIMIT 1;

SELECT sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_sn_id, sfpp.flash_promotion_price, SUM(sfpp.flash_promotion_count) flash_promotion_count, sfpp.flash_promotion_limit, sfpp.flash_promotion_id, sfpp.sort, sfpp.create_time, sfpp.update_time, pp.product_id pp_product_id, pp.product_name pp_product_name, pp.pic pp_pic FROM sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp left join pms_product pp ON sfpp.product_id = pp.product_id where sfpp.flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionPdtId} and user_id is null GROUP BY sfpp.`product_id`,sfpp.`flash_promotion_price`,sfpp.`cpy_type` order by sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id desc limit 6;
select flash_promotion_pdt_id flashPromotionPdtId from sms_flash_promotion_product where flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionId} and flash_promotion_count > 0 and flash_product_status = 2

update.foreach:
update sms_flash_promotion_product
flash_product_status = 1,
flash_product_status = 4,
update_time = now()
flash_promotion_pdt_id = #{item.flashPromotionPdtId}

mapper.select: SELECT pic, product_name FROM pms_product WHERE product_id = #{productId};

SELECT user_id, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN flash_product_status = '2' THEN flash_promotion_origin_price ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) wait_sec_kill, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN flash_product_status = '3' THEN flash_promotion_origin_price ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) wait_put_away, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN flash_product_status = '4' THEN flash_promotion_origin_price ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) wait_sell, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN flash_product_status IN (2, 3, 4) THEN flash_promotion_origin_price ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) sum_sell, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN flash_product_status IN (2, 3, 4) THEN total_amount ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) sum_income FROM sms_flash_promotion_product WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY user_id

SELECT sfpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id, sfp.flash_promotion_title, pp.product_name, ROUND(sfpp.flash_promotion_price / 100, 2) release_price, ROUND(sfpp.flash_promotion_origin_price / 100, 2) original_price, ROUND(sfpp.total_amount / 100, 2) total_amount, sfpp.flash_promotion_count, sfpp.create_time, sfpp.update_time, sfpp.flash_product_status, sfpp.cpy_type FROM sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp LEFT JOIN sms_flash_promotion sfp ON sfpp.flash_promotion_id = sfp.flash_promotion_id LEFT JOIN pms_product pp ON sfpp.product_id = pp.product_id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
